titleStmt.title: Britains glory: being a relation of the solemnity wherewith the English nation residing in Livorne, entertained the joyful tidings of His Sacred Majesties happy return to his royal throne. July 13. Stilo novo.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Edw. Farnham in Popes-head Alley,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
